00006 MoneyValidator::MoneyValidator(QObject *parent, const char *name)
00007     : QValidator(parent,name)
00008 {
00009     regexp = new QRegExp("^\\d*\\.?\\d?\\d?$");
00010 }
00011 
00012 MoneyValidator::~MoneyValidator()
00013 {
00014     delete regexp;
00015 }

00017 QValidator::State MoneyValidator::validate(QString &input, int&) const
00018 {
00019     if(input == "")
00020         return QValidator::Acceptable;
00021     if(regexp->search(input) == -1)
00022         return QValidator::Invalid;
00023     else
00024         return QValidator::Intermediate;
00025 }
00026 
00027 void MoneyValidator::fixup(QString &input) const
00028 {
00029     if(input == "")
00030         return;
00031 
00032     if(input.right(1) == ".")
00033         input.append("00");
00034     if(input.mid(input.length() - 2, 1) == ".")
00035         input.append("0");
00036     if(input.find('.') == -1)
00037     {
00038         if(input.length() == 1)
00039             input.insert(input.length() - 1, ".0");
00040         else
00041             input.insert(input.length() - 2, ".");
00042     }
00043 
00044     if(input.left(1) == ".")
00045         input.insert(0, "0");
00046 }
